title: Whole Foods Market Recalls Curry Chicken Salad Product Due To Possible Listeria Adulteration
summary: WASHINGTON, Oct. 24, 2015 A Whole Foods Market establishment located in Everett, Mass. is recalling approximately 234 pounds of curry chicken salad products that may be adulterated with Listeria monocytogenes, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today.The chicken curry...
